option.name: template
option.value:
package %packageName%.usecase
import %packageName%.datasource.entity.%screenName%EntityResponse
fun %screenName%EntityResponse.toUseCaseModel() = %screenName%UseCaseModel( someFieldExample = exampleField )
fun %screenName%UseCaseModel.toEntityResponse() = %screenName%EntityResponse( exampleField = someFieldExample )

<androidx.fragment.app.FragmentContainerView android:id="@+id/content_fragment_%screenName%" android:name="androidx.navigation.fragment.NavHostFragment" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent" app:layout_constraintRight_toRightOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:defaultNavHost="true" app:navGraph="@navigation/%screenNameSnakeCase%_view_navigation" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

</navigation>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/%screenNameSnakeCase%_parent" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" android:elevation="0dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:foreground="?selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" app:cardCornerRadius="@dimen/cardview_default_radius" app:cardElevation="0dp">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:background="@color/gray1" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="@dimen/default_dp_10_10">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:ellipsize="end" android:maxLines="2" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" tools:text="Insert your view here" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
